q1.question: How can I contact Cargo Matters directly?
q1.answer: Please provide us with some brief information regarding your demand and we will create the right solution. We are available on both phone and email; all contacts are in the CONTACT page.

q2.question: Where is my shipment?
q2.answer: A question you will not have the opportunity to ask, as status will be provided right on time, proactively and precisely.

q3.question: What are the value-added services Cargo Matters can offer?
q3.answer: To provide the utmost tailor-made solution to our customers, we have built up services which solve your logistics challenges. For concrete information of all our specific services, pls visit the section.

q4.question: How can I provide feedback on the services I received?
q4.answer: We value every feedback as it gives us an opportunity to improve our services and the support to our partners. Please send us information on cargo@cargo-matters.com

q5.question: Why Cargo Matters ?
q5.answer: We are focused on providing the right solutions and we do it with expertise, committed to sustainably proving that your Cargo Matters.
